products.name: Dragon Ball Super Vinyl Original Soundtrack Vol.2 2x
products.description:
Dragon Ball Super Vinyl Soundtrack. Official product by Microids Records.

Son Goku is back to face a new threat that is descending upon Earth.

Synopsis: Goku goes to train with Master Kaio, who informs him that a powerful enemy has awakened from a 39-year slumber: Beerus, God of Destruction. Beerus is searching for a warrior who appeared to him in a dream, the Super Saiyan God, whom he wishes to challenge.

The vinyl includes numerous BGM from the Future Trunks and Universe Survival arcs. They range from dark to epic in a very orchestral style with the legendary Norihito Sumitomo composing (DBZ: Battle of Gods, the film, as well as video games like Gran Turismo). Some BGMs were created by Kazuya Yoshii and Takafumi Iwasaki, the latter having worked on musical projects for spin-offs of Digimon and Konosuba.

products.name: Dragon Ball Super Vinyl Original Soundtrack Vol.1 2x
products.description:
Dragon Ball Super Vinyl Soundtrack. Official product by Microids Records.

DRAGONBALL SUPER is a Japanese anime produced by Toei Animation Studios. Scripted by original Dragon Ball author Akira Toriyama, it follows his work and begins shortly after my defeat of Boo in Dragon Ball Z.. "Four years after Boo's death, peace has returned to Earth, and everyone is living in peace. Goku has become a farmer, and Vegeta spends time with his family. However, the desire to train and grow stronger never leaves them. Goku goes to train with Master Kaio, who tells him that a powerful enemy has awakened from a 39-year slumber: Beerus, God of Destruction. The latter is looking for a warrior who appeared to him in a dream, the Divine Super Saiyen, against whom he wishes to measure himself." The anime has been broadcast since 2017 in France on Toonami in a censored version, then in an uncensored version 1 month later. There are 131 episodes and 2 features. The anime doesn't resume until 2025.

products.name: Dragon Ball Z Vinyl Soundtrack Best Collection Limited Edition 2x
products.description:
Dragon Ball Z Vinyl Soundtrack. Official product by Microids Records.

Dragon Ball Z picks up five years after Son Goku's wedding. Radditz, a mysterious space warrior, arrives on Earth to find Goku, who then learns that he comes from a planet of warriors of which only four survivors remain. The storyline is based on a succession of increasingly strong opponents, but there is also frequently a quest or travel context that lends interest to more than just the duels. The series has become a worldwide phenomenon, generating massive merchandising sales and being considered one of the most influential anime franchises of all time. Chiho Kiyooka (YU YU HAKUSHO), Takeshi Ike (TRANSFORMERS) and Keiju Ishikawa (GODZILLA) collaborated on the anime series' iconic music.

An all-new anime series definitely will liven up all over the Dragon Ball!!

products.name: Dragon Ball Z Statue 1/4 Son Goku Super Saiyan Special Color HQS Dioramax by Tsume 90cm
products.description:
Dragon Ball Z Statue of Son Goku Super Saiyan Special Color in HQS Dioramax, 1/4 scale size approx.90cm. Official product in limited edition of 600 pieces by Tsume Art.

SUPER SAIYAN

Son Goku is represented here in two versions. The first, Saiyan undergoing transformation. The second, as a Super Saiyan ready to fight. This HQS Dioramax is therefore offered with 2 characters and an additional base in order to be able to display everything. For this special version, we opted for a paint close to the colors of the anime.

CULT

The most cult transformation, all anime combined...

So many childhood memories, when, fans of Dragon Ball Z, we mimed this transformation in the schoolyard... Revolted by Krillin's death, Son Goku unleashes his rage and reveals his power, transforming into a Super Saiyan to face Frieza in this epic fight.

LED SEQUENCE

LEDs representing Son Goku's explosion of power are present on the statue. Whether fixed or via a sequence (with synchronized audio via an external speaker not included), you will relive this cult passage through an intensity that only Tsume can offer.

W : 57 CM x D : 57 CM x H : 90 CM

products.name: Dragon Ball Z Statue 1/4 Son Goku Super Saiyan Standard Color HQS Dioramax by Tsume 90cm
products.description:
Dragon Ball Z Statue of Son Goku Super Saiyan Standard Color in HQS Dioramax, 1/4 scale size approx.90cm. Official product in limited edition of 1400 pieces by Tsume Art.

SUPER SAIYAN

Son Goku is represented here in two versions. The first, Saiyan undergoing transformation. The second, as a Super Saiyan ready to fight. This HQS Dioramax is therefore offered with 2 characters and an additional base in order to be able to display everything. For this standard version, we opted for a paint respecting the official settings.

CULT

The most cult transformation, all anime combined...

So many childhood memories, when, fans of Dragon Ball Z, we mimed this transformation in the schoolyard... Revolted by Krillin's death, Son Goku unleashes his rage and reveals his power, transforming into a Super Saiyan to face Frieza in this epic fight.

LED SEQUENCE

LEDs representing Son Goku's explosion of power are present on the statue. Whether fixed or via a sequence (with synchronized audio via an external speaker not included), you will relive this cult passage through an intensity that only Tsume can offer.

W : 57 CM x D : 57 CM x H : 90 CM

products.name: Ultimate Guard Boulder 100+ Druidic Secrets Impetus (Dark Orange)
products.description:
Ultimate Guard Boulder 100+ Druidic Secrets Impetus (Dark Orange). Produit officiel par Ultimate Guard.

Turn your deck boxes into a mystical place! With the Druidic Secrets Boulder 100+, you not only get a reliable card deck box of the highest Ultimate Guard quality, but also a real eye-catcher with its magical ornaments - whether as a single box or a perfect addition to our Druidic Secrets Bundle. With six exclusive colors and mystical patterns, you're sure to find the deck box that's right for you. The Druidic Secrets Boulder 100+ has our famous soft-touch finish, and inside the box fit 100 double-sleeved cards.

  • Designed for 100 double-sleeved or 120 single-sleeved cards
  • Modular design to combine with a variety of Ultimate Guard products
  • Durable and rigid box
  • The perfect complement to the limited edition Ultimate Guard Druidic Secrets Bundle
  • Soft-touch finish
  • Secure closure

Box size: 76 × 75 × 98.5 mm

products.name: Ultimate Guard Katana: The Shogun's Journey - Part 1 - Samurai's Chest (Omnihive 1000+ Xenoskin & Play-Mat)
products.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of ancient Japan with the first installment of our Katana series, The Shogun's Journey! The Samurai's Chest consists of an Omnihive Xenoskin in the style of traditional Japanese wood art and a Play-Mat that takes you on a journey to a cloud-covered mountain village. The Omnihive holds over 1000 standard-size cards (double-sleeved), and the deck box, like the Play-Mat, is limited and exclusive to this bundle.

 

FEATURES OMNIHIVE

 

Designed for 1000+ double-sleeved or 1250+ single-sleeved cards
Great for Commander/EDH decks
Convenient for carrying multiple decks, dice, and/or Play-Mats
Two magnetic trays for flexible positioning and storing of accessories or double-sleeved cards
Quality microfiber inner lining
Strong magnetic closure with additional ZnapClaw locking mechanism
Resistant Xenoskin material
Modular design to combine with Ultimate Guard products
Dimensions approx.: 238 x 92 x 407 mm

 

FEATURES PLAYMAT

 

Protects gaming cards and accessories during gameplay
Full colour print with limited artwork design
Anti-slip underside for maximum gaming grip
Natural rubber
2mm thick soft cushioned Play-Mat
Size: 61 x 35 cm

  • Adjustable shoulder strap and handles to carry it as you want

products.name: Dragon Ball Z Set of 2 Statues Diorama 1/6 HQS Vegeta Galick Gun & Goku Kaio-ken 37-73cm (New)
products.description:
Dragon Ball Z Set Statue Diorama of Vegeta Galick Gun & Goku Kaio-ken in HQS collection, 1/6 scale size approx.37-73cm. Official product in limited edition of 3000 pieces by Tsume Art.

I'm going to crush you along with the rest of the Earth!! Go ahead and try to dodge this if you can! Even if you spare yourself, the Earth will be blown to pieces! Theres absolutly no way you stop my Gyarikku Ho blast!! Let you and the Earth together turn to SPACE DUST!!-Vegeta

- "You are going to WHAT !? Dammit, he thought this through! I aint no choice but to risk it! Times-three Kaio-ken KAMEHAME-HA !!!!"- Son Goku

Relive the first encounter and first clash on Earth between Son Goku, the hero of Dragon Ball Z and Vegeta, the Prince of Saiyans, through the realization of an explosive 1/6 HQS statue!

Although these two protagonists share the same origins, they do not share the same purpose, since everything opposes them, especially their convictions! The ruthless anti-hero wants to prove his incontestable superiority at all costs by destroying the planet, its inhabitants and adversary, while the Earths great defender intends to use all his strength to prevent it, fed by a destructive desire for revenge. There is only one solution: to engage in a merciless fight May the strongest win!

Determined to protect his family and avenge his friends, Son Goku is determined to let his rage out! In reality, he has no choice, he cannot fail: on his victory depends the survival of humanity. We see him here deploying all his strength and energy to fight and try to defeat the space warrior and Saiyans prince, preparing a fearsome attack taught by his master Kaiō-sama: the Kaio-ken x3! An overpowering and destructive attack that forces him to push his limits, thereby putting his own life in danger!

We recognize the place of the clash thanks to the terracotta desert ground painted in a gradation of brown, orange and reddish shades, while we notice that the rocks rise in the air due to the immeasurable energy exerted by Son Goku. The Saiyan's rage and determination can be read in his merciless dark gaze which he keeps fixated on his enemy. He will do everything in his power to save his loved ones this time around: the titanic effort he generates is transcribed through the fierce expression of his grimacing face as well as the muscles of his overdeveloped chest ready to tear themselves apart. The Saiyans super massive and protruding musculature is underlined by the light and shadow effects performed by our painters, while the reddish aura enveloping his entire figure manifests his transformation.

The warrior wears his usual orange trousers tightened at the waist by his blue belt floating in the air under the effect of the attack, like his dark hair. His orange and navy blue shoes sink into the ground to stabilize themselves by accumulating as much energy as possible. Cracking the ground under the effect of the energy deployed, legs spread, arms outstretched, he is about to unleash all his power to remind his assailant of the reason why he should never have set foot on this planet. We then see him forming with his hands a sphere of energy in translucent resin in shades of blue, while the immense aura of energy in translucent red resin behind him and the dust suddenly rising from the ground testify to the strength of the shock caused by the attack intended to wipe his opponent from the face of the earth!

The blue sphere of energy can be placed or not in the palm of Son Goku's hands thanks to its interchangeable arms, thus showing the Saiyan preparing his attack or even attacking, especially if he is placed in front of the Vegeta HQS statue associated, in order to bring the combat between the two super warriors to life. Likewise, it is possible to replace the blue translucent resin aura to the left of Son Goku and the ones before him with rocks, if he has not yet attacked. Finally, the plinth is equipped with a LED to make the confrontation larger than life and turn the animation into reality.

The statue comes with a numbered plate and a certificate of authenticity.

Scale 1/6 Total run of 3000 pieces.
This product is not a toy or product for children. It is a collectors item intended for adults only.

products.name: Dragon Ball Z Statue 1/6 Trunks' Time Machine HQS Dioramax 65cm
products.description:
Dragon Ball Z Statue of Trunks' Time Machine in HQS Dioramax, 1/6 scale size approx.65cm. Official product in limited edition of 1600 pieces by Tsume Art.

- « H-O-P-E, Hope ? » - Bulma

- « Yes! I wrote it just before I left from the future and… You find the exact same thing written on the other capsule! » - Trunks

This HQS Dioramax statue features Future Trunks as he discovers the abandoned time machine on Earth, accompanied by Gohan and Bulma. Returning to the past in order to save Son Goku and avoid a tragic fate for the planet, he compares this strange discovery with his own and unique machine: these are exactly the same! Wearing his Capsule Corporation jacket, Trunks uses his sleeve to clean up the moss that has invaded the abandoned machine, originally yellow and blue. He realizes that under this vegetation, we can read the word "Hope !!", which he had engraved on his machine before traveling in the past ... The doubt is raised! We see in the gaze and attitude of Trunks that he becomes aware of the disaster that the presence of this machine can portend ... Almost completely covered in moss, the status of the machine suggests that it has been here for a long time, or at least enough time for nature to reclaim its rights over its environment. Trunks then noticed the gaping hole in the cockpit in transparent resin, suggesting it had been melted from inside the machine. While trying to decipher this riddle, we find here the two halves of an eggshell, while the on-board computer indicates that the mysterious passenger would have arrived in the timeline of Son Goku and his friends 3 years before Trunks … Could it be that a life form from the future is lurking on Earth without anyone knowing? In order to be able to observe the entire scene, an electric rotating plate has been integrated into the base of the statue (power supply provided). As Son Gohan sees it in the distance, we can make out the shell of a huge insect that would have molted and left the remains of its old life behind ... The hunt for cyborgs is on, Cell’s evolution has begun ...

Size : W : 63 CM x D : 73 CM x H : 65 CM

The Trading Card Collector Frame with 16 positions by GB Eye is perfect to display your collection of cards. The specially designed double mount holds your favourite cards in position without the need for tape or glue.

This high-quality frame will enhance your collection and will highlight them with an opening that creates a perfect exposure.

In a living room, a hallway, a bedroom or even a staircase, this frame is the perfect decoration idea to customize your interior.

  • Suitable for American trading cards

  • Pre-hung for quick and easy hanging

products.name: Dragon Ball Z Statue 1/6 Gohan vs Buu HQS by Tsume 69cm
products.description:
Dragon Ball Z Statue of Gohan vs Buu in HQS range, 1/6 scale size approx.69cm. Official product in limited edition of 1400 pieces by Tsume Art.

This HQS statue of Gohan vs Buu features Mystic Gohan arriving on Earth to face Super Buu in the episode « Boo is Overwhelmed!! Gohan’s Miracle Power », being the only one who can save his people and planet! Determined to stop his ruthless opponent in his destructive and murderous madness, he appears here in his ultra-powerful form of Ultimate Warrior, acquired after Elder Kaiōshin unlocked his full potential, as shown by the white aura in transparent resin surrounding him. After annihilating his creators, Super Buu looks forward to eradicating the earth and all life from the universe and will let nothing and no one stand in his joyous mission of total destruction. This more impressive and muscular form of Majin Buu is the result of Evil Buu having devoured Good Buu in chocolate form. Having become much more powerful with increased mental capacity, the insatiable genius is seized with an extremely dangerous fit of anger, even possessing the power to rip through dimensional walls. 

Having opposite goals, the stubborn savior being ready to do anything to protect and the demonic genius stopping at nothing to exterminate absolutely everything, they will face each other in a merciless fight. The phenomenal antagonist giving the Strongest Warrior a hard time, he uses an attack taking his opponent by surprise to literally make him bite the dust. After throwing him violently into the air as evidenced by the sand rising from the ground and the transparent resin clouds he crosses, Super Gohan in turn propels himself into the sky, preceded by speed effects. Awaiting his timely encounter overhead with the bewildered pink demon, Ultimate Gohan, looking resolute, deals him the killing blow with a brutal backhand of his fist condemning him to crash at the speed of light against the desert ground, as indicated by the transparent effects trapping his arms or his expression of shock and pain... A good reason to think twice before trying to annihilate an entire galaxy!

Features :

  • Materials:  RESINE PVC METAL MAGNETS
  • Scale: 1/6
  • Dimensions: L : 52 CM x P : 53 CM x H : 69 CM

This product is not a toy or product for children. It is a collectors item intended for adults only.
